StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [FindApplicantBySSN]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @SSN varchar(11) ) AS
DECLARE @NWA_GUID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER
IF LEN(@SSN) = 9 BEGIN SET @SSN = SUBSTRING(@SSN,1,3) + '-' + SUBSTRING(@SSN,4,2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(@SSN,6,4) END
SELECT @NWA_GUID = N.rowguid FROM MCRISS.dbo.PERSON P INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.vwCurrentNWA N ON P.PERSON_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID WHERE SUBSTRING(P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER,1,3) + '-' + SUBSTRING(P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER,4,2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER,6,4) = @SSN
UPDATE app SET app.NWAID = @NWA_GUID FROM [ACP].[Person] per INNER JOIN [ACP].[Applicant] app ON per.[PersonId] = app.[PersonId] INNER JOIN [ACP].[Package] pac ON app.PackageId = pac.PackageId AND pac.DateUploaded IN ( SELECT MAX(pac2.DateUploaded) FROM ACP.Person p2 INNER JOIN ACP.Applicant app2 ON p2.PersonId = app2.PersonId INNER JOIN [ACP].[Package] pac2 ON pac2.PackageId = app2.PackageId WHERE p2.SSN = @SSN) WHERE per.SSN = @SSN
SELECT per.[PersonId] ,per.[SSN] ,per.[FirstName] ,per.[LastName] ,per.[MaidenName] ,per.[MiddleName] ,per.[Su.x] ,pac.[UploadedBy] ,pac.[DateUploaded] ,pac.[Locked] ,pac.[LockedBy] ,pac.[DateLocked] ,pac.[PackageId] ,n.SourceDualDesc OPPC FROM [ACP].[Person] per INNER JOIN [ACP].[Applicant]app ON per.[PersonId] = app.[PersonId] INNER JOIN [ACP].[Package] pac ON app.[PackageId] = pac.[PackageId] INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[DBO].[NWA] n on app.NWAID = n.[ROWGUID]
WHERE per.[SSN] = @SSN
